name: Supersonic Dogfighters
description:
Supersonic Dogfighters is a roguelite game about a group of pilots trying to defend the archipelagos of the Peaceful Sea from various factions that are trying to conquer them.

Gather tons of upgrades and new planes as you defeats foes in this colorful roguelite game.

How to play:

  • Rotate with "A" and "D" or the left stick.
  • Accelerate with "W" or "R2"
  • Deaccelerate with "S" or "L2"
  • Shoot with "SPACEBAR" or "CROSS/A"
  • Launch Missiles with "E" or "SQUARE/X"
  • Deploy Gadget with "Q" or "TRIANGLE/Y"
  • Defense with "SHIFT" or "CIRCLE/B"

Some actions may need a power up to be perfomable.

The game is currently in development, but here are some of the things that will be added in the future:

  • New planes and power ups
  • New stages
  • Shops
  • Dialogues and story
  • Characters with unique abilities
  • Main hub island
